DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to establish safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multiple doses of MYK-461 in human subjects. This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, sequential group, multiple ascending (oral tablet) dose study in healthy volunteers aged 18-55 years.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Multiple Ascending Oral Doses of MYK-461 in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Normal body mass index (BMI) Normal LVEF Normal electrocardiogram (ECG) Females must be non pregnant, non lactating and, if sexually active, be using an acceptable birth control method from the time of first dose through 3 months after the last dose of study drug Any structural abnormalities on echocardiography Positive results of HIV test and/or seropositive for HCV or HBV
